Plot: James Bond heads to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.
Title: Tomorrow Never Dies
Actors: Pierce Brosnan, Jonathan Pryce, Michelle Yeoh, Teri Hatcher
tomatoConsensus: A competent, if sometimes by-the-numbers entry to the 007 franchise, Tomorrow Never Dies may not boast the most original plot but its action sequences are genuinely thrilling.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 6 wins & 9 nominations.
